title: Those awful hats
creator_credit: D.W. Griffith and American Mutoscope and Biograph Company
brief_description: Women wearing hats in the cinema can be rather annoying particularly if they obscure your line of vision. A comic short. Cast includes Mack Sennett, Flora Finch, Linda Arvidson, John R. Cumpson, George Gebhardt. Silent film with no intertitles.
